Reviews.Title: decent FPV camera
Reviews.Author: Paulo
Reviews.Content: If you don't want to wait 30 days for hobbyking or pay a lot of money for a camera, this is your best bet. It's 5v

Reviews.Title: Acceptable for FPV, Definitely!
Reviews.Author: Donald J. Kinney "DJ"
Reviews.Content: THE TRUTH: Most of these cameras are assembled from the same parts made at the same factories in China, creating clones and copies, and ripping off each other's ideas. This camera is identical to many other cameras you'll find on the hobby sites, complete with focusing lens (replaceable) and exposed circuitry on the back. The difference is that this is Prime, and you don't have to wait for a month for the slow boat from Hong Kong.THE GOOD: I think the unit feels very solid. It definitely uses the same optics as any of the other Chinese-made cameras of this kind, all the way up to the $200 FPV cams (I believe it's a 2.5mm lens). The body is solid. There are mounting holes as well and can easily be sealed up with some resin.THE NOT-SO-GOOD: This is not a replacement for a high-end FPV cam and it is never going to look as good as a GoPro. I do believe that it has 520 lines, but there is a lot of softness in the image. It has absolutely no ability to show very bright and very dark areas simultaneously. The light absolutely will blow out. With that said, if it's outside for FPV or inside trying to catch an employee stealing, it'll work. Just don't put it in a position to need to capture daylight and interior. This is not a high-definition camera. It just isn't. But I am going to be using it as a downward facing landing camera or possibly an emergency secondary camera if my GoPro fails during a flight. It's perfect for that.MORE TRUTH: It does not get hot on 5 volts. It does not shut off intermittently. The negative reviews here seem to have additional problems going on with hardware and/or basic electrical knowledge.I'll probably buy another one.I am going to be using this camera for an FPV ship.

Reviews.Title: Great low-cost product for size, light sensitivity, and responsive vendor!
Reviews.Author: Geoff
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the model MC495 camera.  I have 12 operating, and found them very reliable over the past 2 years.Every one I ordered from Securitying arrived promptly, in excellent condition.  This product accomodates a wide range of lighting conditions, and the advertised 0.008 lux/F1.2 sensitivity featured allows operation in very low light conditions at night, without IR LED illumination.  The camera has an exposed PC circuit board and wires glued on the backside that require strain relief and anadded layer of physical protection from the elements, if used outdoors.  This camera comes with a wide angle 90 deg 3.6mm lens.  I found two other vendors on Amazon that offer 6mm, 12mm, and 18mm lenses at nominal cost that are interchangeable for this camera.  I have not used the auxiliary microphone to be able to rate audio.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture, sound is acceptable
Reviews.Author: B. E. Harkins "Billy in South Ga"
Reviews.Content: I was a little worried about the flimseyness of the outfit but I manged to securely mount it and put it to use and noticed it works great.

Reviews.Title: Same as more expensive one selling overseas - Great for small aircraft FPV use
Reviews.Author: RC
Reviews.Content: While CCD's are better for FPV use, when it comes to using the lightest camera in small aircraft, this micro camera performs very well. It's practically the same 8g micro camera being sold by the R/C hobby stores. Shipping was quick and the camera performs great!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!  Mediocre Audio.
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: Purchased two of these and am very pleased with the cameras!  Very concealable and easy to use.  They shoot excellent video quality in moderate lighting and even in very low lighting they still deliver a clear picture but with a loss of color.  The audio quality from the built in microphone is not great and the only reason I did not give 5 stars.  If you want to be able to make out anything below normal conversation levels you might want to consider adding an external mic.  I will be ordering more of these when they get back in stock!

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: ScottT
Reviews.Content: It has a decent picture and works well at night.  I have some night light in the area i mounted it, so i'm not sure that this would pick up an image well in the pure dark (probably not, there is no night vision built in).If the specs look right for you, i recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Matthew
Reviews.Content: Building a DIY nightvision for airsoft, this thing is super ideal because of it's lux rating for the money. With it as low as .008 lux for $30, I'll never use another camera to see in the dark after this one. Just be super careful that you only put 5V into it. Accidentally fried mine when I plugged it into a 12V power source without thinking. Already bought a replacement. 5/5 stars anyway.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this
Reviews.Author: Merce
Reviews.Content: Terrible , this tiny camera look very nice and concealable , very nice view and clear , but the most biggest problem is it getting very hot after few minutes of operation , I used this in my car for a DVR but afraid it get burn so I returned , if you want to take a chance to buy this , you will return this very soon

Reviews.Title: Avoid this camera if you need reliable footage.
Reviews.Author: debtfreemt
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to aid in my quest to stop an employee from robbing me blind.  I discretely located the camera out of sight and recorded (I thought) some telling footage.The camera only records for a few seconds then 'rests'.  It is extremely difficult to draw any solid conclusions when there is more blank footage than images of the suspect.Find a better camera this one is useless.

Reviews.Title: Works like a champ
Reviews.Author: radiohead4737
Reviews.Content: This is a very high quality camera I have two and they both operate like more expensive units very very happy with it thank you for the sale.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Buyer
Reviews.Content: I have not installed these but did test them out and they have great resolution and color tones and the sound comes out great.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Chad_inc
Reviews.Content: I was really excited about this camera.  It looked perfect...on paper.When I received the product it was exactly as shown in the picture.  As shown in the picture, the back of the circuit board is exposed. I didn't think that this would be a large issue, however when power is running to it this area gets extremely hot.With the back exposed the picture cuts in and out.  Unless the wires out of the back are positioned in the perfect way, you will not get any picture or sound.  Because of this design this camera can only used indoors; assuming the wires are aligned in the right way.Do yourself a favor and look elsewhere.

ProductInfo.Features:
This Surveillance Spy Pinhole Video Security Camera Can Be Used As One Component of Surveillance Systems in Various Indoor Environments with High Stability.
Miniature Covert Shape, Aluminum Material, 3.6mm Lens F2.0/90 Degrees View Angle. Power Supply, Input: AC 100V ~ 240V, 50 ~ 60 Hz, Output: DC 5V, 1000mA.
Image Sensor: MC495 1/3" CMOS Image Sensor. Horizontal Resolution: 520 TVL. TV System: NTSC. Effective Pixels: 786(H) x 576(V).
Support Video and Audio Output, Video Output: 1.0V p ~ p/75ohm, Audio Output: 1.0V p ~ p/1Kohm.
Internal Synchronization, No Auto Gain Control, No Back Light Compensation, No White Balance Control, 0.45 Y Characteristic.
ProductInfo.Name: SecurityIng - 520 TV Lines MC495 1/3 Inch CMOS Image Sensor Mini Covert Color CCTV Surveillance Security Camera, 3.6mm F2.0/90 Degrees View Angle Lens, Support Video and Audio Output, for Hidden Audio & Video Surveillance Security Camera
